scene.text: There's a commotion inside, followed by a scream.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Mr. Manchas?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: The door creaks open just an inch. Nick and Hopps seem startled... Hopps slowly pushes the door open, revealing Manchas in the center of the room, hunched over and grunting.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Buddy?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Are you... okay?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps looks at Manchas. RAAAGH!!! Manchas turns, right at them. His eyes are dilated, he's turned savage! He's poised to pounce on Nick and Hopps.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Run. RUN!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: The Jaguar tears after them, he's deranged, primal. Nick and Hopps run! The jaguar is closing in.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: What is wrong with him?!

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: I don't know!!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick and Hopps run across the bridge. Manchas closes in.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Jump!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: They jump off the bridge to a lower branch. They duck into a hollow log and Manchas follows them.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: (to Nick) Head down!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps frantically picks up her police radio.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Officer Hopps to dispatch!

scene.title: INT. POLICE STATION - DISPATCH - SAME
scene.text: We find Clawhauser showing a handcuffed PERP a video on his phone of pop star Gazelle singing and dancing. A RED LIGHT blinks on the desk phone, but Clawhauser ignores it.

scene.title: CLAWHAUSER
scene.text: Are you familiar with Gazelle? Greatest singer of our lifetime-- angel with horns-- okay, hold on, keep watching. Who's that beside her? Who is it?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Reveal: Clawhauser is dancing on stage with Gazelle.

scene.title: GAZELLE
scene.text: Wow, you are one hot dancer... (digitized robo-voice)

scene.title: CLAWHAUSER
scene.text: (joyous laughter) It's me! Did you think it was real? It looks so real! It's not. It's just a new app. (finally notices ringing phone) Hold on a second--

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Clawhauser clicks the speaker button and--

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: CLAWHAUSER!

scene.title: CLAWHAUSER!
scene.text: Blue Rev. (mm/dd/yy)                  62.

scene.title: EXT. THE CANOPY - SAME
scene.text: RAAGH! Manchas takes a swipe at Nick.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Clawhauser, listen to me! We have a 10-91! Jaguar gone savage! Vine and Tu-junja!

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: It's Tujunga!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: As they emerge from the log, Hopps slips, dropping her radio.

scene.title: CLAWHAUSER
scene.text: Okay, we're sending back up! Hopps?

scene.title: HOPPS?!
scene.text: Nick and Hopps run, sliding around a corner. Ahead is a gondola station.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: There! Head to the skytrams!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: They run to the gondolas. Hopps darts out of Manchas' way, but slips and is headed off the platform when she manages to grab on-- dangling from the edge. Nick searches for her...

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Get in! Carrots? Carrots!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: He tries to hold on to the gondola for Hopps, who is struggling to pull herself back onto the platform.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Go!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: As the gondola pulls away, Nick tries to stop it to no avail.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: No, no, no!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick backs up... the jaguar stalks him.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Buddy, one predator to another--                      *

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: The jaguar charges, but before it gets Nick-- clank! It's       * yanked back in place. We see a HANDCUFF on its back paw, attached to a metal post. Hopps cuffed him!

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Now, I can tell you're a little tense, so I'm just gonna give you a little personal space--

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: The jaguar thrashes, knocking Nick and Hopps over the edge. Hopps barely grabs a vine, but struggles to hold Nick in the other hand. As Manchas growls at them from above, Nick looks at the abyss below. Hopps looks around, her mind racing.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Rabbit, whatever you do, do not let go!

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: I'm gonna let go!

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: No, you what? No, I said-- listen-- noooo!

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: One, two--

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps lets go, swinging them over to a netting of vines, kind of on top of each other. They can't believe they're alive. They look at each other, stunned, relieved...

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Carrots. You saved my life.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Well. That's what we do at the

scene.title: ZP...
scene.text: (the branch snaps) Deeeeeeeeeeeee.....

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick and Hopps plummet. They are about to hit the ground, but a vine attached to their legs stops them right before impact. Woo! A convoy of police arrive, screeching in front of them. Out steps... Bogo. Hopps smiles, the cavalry has arrived.

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: Well, this should be good.

scene.title: MOMENTS LATER --
scene.text: Hopps leads the cops up to the canopy, full of confidence.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: I thought this was just a missing mammal case, but it's way bigger.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Mr. Otterton did not just disappear. I believe he and this jaguar, they... went savage, Sir.

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: (scoffing) Savage? This isn't the Stone Age, Hopps. Animals don't go savage.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: I thought so too, `til I saw this:

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps pulls back some leaves to reveal: the jaguar is gone. There is no sign of him... or his handcuffs. It's like it never happened. Hopps' eyes go wide.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: What? He was right here...

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: (not buying it) The "savage" jaguar.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Sir, I know what I saw-- he almost killed us.

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: Or maybe any aggressive predator looks savage to you rabbits. (calls out, to cops) Let's go.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Wait-- Sir, I'm not the only one who saw him! (to Nick) Nick!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps turns to Nick, but before he can explain:

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: (incredulous) You think I'm going to believe a fox?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Well he was a key witness and I enlisted--

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: (the last straw) Two days to find the otter...

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: or you quit... that was the deal. Badge.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Bogo extends his arm, waiting for Hopps to hand it over.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: But, Sir, we...

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: Badge.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps looks at Bogo, then looks at her badge, she's about to reach for it, when...

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Uh, no.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Bogo stops, and glares at Nick.

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: What did you say, fox?

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Sorry, what I said was, "no." She will not be giving you that badge. Look, you gave her a clown vest and a three-wheel joke-mobile and two days to solve a case you guys haven't cracked in two weeks? Yeah, no wonder she needed to get help from a fox, none of you guys were gonna help her, were you?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps looks at Nick, stunned he's sticking up for her.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Here's the thing Chief, you gave her the 48 hours, so technically we still have 10 left to find our Mr. Otterton... and that's exactly what we're gonna do, so if you'll excuse us... we have a very big lead to follow and a case to crack. Good day.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick guides Hopps to a PASSING GONDOLA, motioning her in.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Officer Hopps?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: The gondola pulls away, leaving Bogo and the rest of the police watching, flabbergasted.

scene.title: INT./EXT. GONDOLA - CONTINUOUS
scene.text: Hopps and Nick both stare straight ahead.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Thank you.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Never let `em see that they get to you.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps looks at Nick, a little surprised. Nick looks out.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: So, things do get to you...

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: No... I mean, not anymore. But I was small and emotionally unbalanced like you once.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Har-har.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: (retreating into the memory) No, it's true. I think was 8, or maybe 9, and all I wanted to do was join the Junior Ranger Scouts.

scene.title: INT. YOUNG NICK'S BEDROOM - DUSK
scene.text: YOUNG NICK, tiny and cherubic, looks in the mirror. We see MOTHER's paws tying the scout kerchief around his neck.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: ...so, my mom scraped together enough money to buy me a brand new uniform because, by God, I was gonna fit in.

scene.title: EXT. SCOUT BUILDING - NIGHT
scene.text: Young Nick bounds down the sidewalk and up the stairs.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Even if I was the only predator in the troop--

scene.title: INT. SCOUT MEETING - MOMENTS LATER
scene.text: Young Nick enters a church basement, spots a GROUP OF PREY KIDS, all in scout uniforms. They wave him over.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: ...the only fox.

scene.title: MEAN KID ANIMAL
scene.text: Okay, Nick!

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: I was gonna be part of a pack.

scene.title: MEAN KID ANIMAL
scene.text: Ready for initiation?

scene.title: YOUNG NICK
scene.text: Yeah! Pretty much born ready.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: They high five Nick. It looks promising and fun.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: I was so proud.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Suddenly, a BIG KID turns off the lights. Other KIDS switch on FLASHLIGHTS, shining them on Nick like gestapo spotlights.

scene.title: MEAN KID ANIMAL
scene.text: Okay. Now raise your right hand and deliver the oath.

scene.title: YOUNG NICK
scene.text: I, Nicholas Wilde, promise to be brave, loyal, helpful, and trustworthy.

scene.title: MEAN KID ANIMAL
scene.text: Even though you're a fox?

scene.title: YOUNG NICK
scene.text: What?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Then, a bunch of KID ANIMALS tackle Nick. Soon, all of the animals pile on, kicking and shoving him.

scene.title: YOUNG NICK
scene.text: No! What did I do wrong, you guys?! No! Please tell me, what did I do wrong?!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: With Nick pinned, the primary mean kid straddles him. Someone hands him a MUZZLE. The mean kid snaps it on Nick's snout.

scene.title: YOUNG NICK
scene.text: (muzzled) What did I do?!

scene.title: MEAN KID ANIMAL
scene.text: If you thought we would ever trust a fox without a muzzle, you're even dumber than you look.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick breaks free from the kids. Scrambles away from them in fright. As they laugh, he races out the door.

scene.title: MEAN KID ANIMAL
scene.text: Aw, is he gonna cry?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Once out sight, Nick panics as he struggles to remove the muzzle. It won't come off. Finally-- painfully-- he pulls it off and throws it to the ground. He collapses, weeping.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: I learned two things that day. One, I was never gonna let anyone see that they got to me.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps looks at Nick, who avoids eye contact.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: ...And two?

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: If the world's only gonna see a fox as shifty and untrustworthy, there's no point in trying to be anything else.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Nick, you are so much more than that...

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps touches Nick's arm as the gondola pierces the clouds. The city at dawn comes into view. It's gotten too real for Nick. He abruptly changes the subject.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Boy, look at that traffic down there. (putting on radio voice) How about we go out to Chuck in Traffic Central-- Chuck, how are things looking on the Jam Cams?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Nick, I'm glad you told me...

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: (lightbulb moment!) The Jam Cams...!

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Seriously, it's okay...

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: No-n-shh-shush! There are traffic cameras everywhere. All over the canopy. Whatever happened to that jaguar--

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: The traffic cams would have caught it!

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Bingo!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps gives him a chuck on the arm, impressed.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Pretty sneaky, Slick.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: However. If you didn't have access to the system before, I doubt Chief Buffalo Butt is gonna let you into it now.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: (beat, then) No... But I have a friend at City Hall who might.

scene.title: INT. CITY HALL - LATER THAT MORNING
scene.text: We find BELLWETHER trying to balance a stack of binders while struggling to keep pace with Mayor Lionheart, who is walking quickly in front of her.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Sir? If we could just review these very important-- (almost drops binders) Sir?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: She almost steps on a LITTLE MOUSE LADY.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Ooo, I'm so sorry... sir?!

scene.title: LIONHEART
scene.text: Okay. I heard you, Bellwether. Just take care of it! (setting another binder atop her stack) Please. And clear my afternoon, I'm going out.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: No, no! But, sir, you do have a meeting with Herds and Grazing... sir, if I could just--

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: He continues through a door. Bellwether tries to follow, but the door shuts on her, spilling the binders to the floor.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Oh, mutton chops.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: As Bellwether picks up her mess, Hopps and Nick appear.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Assistant Mayor Bellwether? We need your help.

scene.title: INT. BELLWETHER'S OFFICE - LATER
scene.text: We're in Bellwether's cramped little office. Nick and Hopps hover over her while she sits at her computer.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: We just need to get into the traffic cam database.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick subtly touches Bellwether's wool puff.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: (mouths, to Hopps) So fluffy!

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Hey!

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Sheep never let me this close.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: You can't just touch a sheep's wool...

scene.title: NICK                          HOPPS
scene.text: It's like cotton candy.            Stop it! Judy swats Nick, but accidentally hits Bellwether's puff.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Where to?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Rainforest District, Vine and Tujunga.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: ANGLE ON the computer screen.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: There! Traffic cams for the whole city. This is so exciting, actually. Well, you know, I never get to do anything this important.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: But you're the Assistant Mayor of Zootopia.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Oh, I'm more of a glorified secretary. I think Mayor Lionheart just wanted the sheep vote... (then, cheerily) But he did give me that nice mug.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: She motions to a mug that reads World's Greatest Dad Assistant Mayor.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Feels good to be appreciated.

scene.title: LIONHEART
scene.text: Smellwether?!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Bellwether cringes.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: That's a fun little name he likes to use. I called him Lionfart once. He did not care for that, let me tell you. It was not a good day for me. (pressing intercom button) Yes, sir?

scene.title: LIONHEART
scene.text: I thought you were going to cancel my afternoon?!

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Oh, dear. I better go -- (to Hopps, while leaving) Let me know what you find. It was really nice for me to be--

scene.title: LIONHEART
scene.text: While we're young, Smellwether!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Bellwether finally opens her big heavy door and leaves.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: You think when she goes to sleep she counts herself?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Shush. Okay, traffic cams... (looking at computer) Tujunga, Tujunga... we're in.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick and Hopps watch the footage from the night before. We can see the jaguar going nuts. Then a BLACK VAN skids up, and some WOLVES hop out.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Who are these guys?

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Timberwolves. Look at these dumdums.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: The Wolves suddenly capture the jaguar with a net. Judy GASPS, shocked. Nick is unfazed.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Betcha a nickel one of em's gonna howl.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: The wolves howl...

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: And there it is. What is it with wolves and the howling? It's like--

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: (light-bulb moment) Howlers! Night howlers! That's what Manchas was afraid of... wolves! The wolves are the night howlers. If they took Manchas...

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: ...I bet they took Otterton too.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: All we gotta do is find out where they went.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: She clicks the monitor... but as the wolves drive off, they disappear through a tunnel and don't come out the other side.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Wait. Where'd they go?

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: You know, if I wanted to avoid surveillance because I was doing something illegal-- which I never have-- I would use the maintenance tunnel 6B... which would put them out...

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: He clicks on another camera. Nothing... then... the wolves emerge in the van.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: ...right there.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps looks at Nick, impressed.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Well, look at you, Junior Detective. You know, I think you'd actually make a pretty good cop.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: How dare you.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps goes back to clicking... we track the wolves through alleys and back roads.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Acacia alley... Ficus underpass... South Canyon...

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: They're heading out of town... Where does that road go?

scene.title: EXT. CLIFFSIDE ASYLUM - GOLDEN HOUR
scene.text: The imposing CLIFFSIDE ASYLUM sits on the edge of a waterfall. Nick and Hopps, hidden on the side of the road, spy from a hundred yards away. Nick and Hopps sneak up to the guard gate, where TWO WOLVES are stationed.

Using elaborate hand signals, Nick motions he's going to sneak past first. He gets around the gate, but as he gets close... a wolf sniffs the air... he's onto him. Nick reaches around and grabs a piece of wood to use as a weapon. The wolf moves toward Nick... but before he reaches him... Ooooooooooo! A distant howl grabs his attention. It's Hopps, cupping her mouth to make the howl sound distant. The wolf hears it and can't help but howl as well. Another guard approaches.

scene.title: WOLF GUARD
scene.text: Gary, quit it, you're gonna start a howl.

scene.title: GARY THE WOLF GUARD
scene.text: I didn't start it. (more howling off-screen) Oooooooo!

scene.title: WOLF GUARD
scene.text: Oooooooooo!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: More wolves start to howl. Nick looks at Hopps, impressed.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Come on!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick and Hopps use the distraction to jump the fence and sneak into the complex.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: You are a clever bunny.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Above, they notice a drainage pipe leading into the building.

scene.title: INT. CLIFFSIDE ASYLUM - LARGE ROOM - MOMENTS LATER
scene.text: Nick and Hopps emerge from the drain pipe into the creepy asylum. They're in a large, cavernous room, full of old MEDICAL EQUIPMENT. It's like a combination of an old hospital and a turn-of-the-century zoo.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: It looks like this was a hospital.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Judy shines her light down a corridor, at the end of which is a metal door with a blue light shining within. Nick nears the door, about to open it... the tension builds and then...

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: (turns to Hopps) You know, after you, you're the cop.

scene.title: INT. CLIFFSIDE ASYLUM - MEDICAL WARD - MOMENTS LATER
scene.text: Hopps cautiously pushes the door open to reveal: a room with modern medical equipment. Nick pops up behind her.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Okay. All clear.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps rolls her eyes and cautiously enters and looks around.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: All this equipment is brand new...

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Carrots...?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick points to the ground, which is scuffed with CLAW MARKS.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Claw marks...

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Yeah. Huge, huge, claw marks. I mean, what kind of--

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: RAAGH! A SAVAGE TIGER emerges behind the glass of a nearby cage, startling Nick and sending him running to Hopps. Hopps swivels her flashlight to reveal: dozens of reflective eyes. Nick and Hopps make their way down a long corridor of cages, looking for the jaguar.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Mr. Manchas.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: He's still feral, on all fours and pacing in a cell. They continue on, passing three, four, five, cages until finally, in the last cage: a FERAL OTTER. It's EMMITT OTTERTON.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: It's him. We found our otter. (to the otter, gently) Mr. Otterton, my name is Officer Judy Hopps. Your wife sent me to find you. We're gonna get you out of here now.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Otterton screeches at her and lunges toward the glass.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Or not. Guess he's in no rush to get home to the Missus.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps looks back down the corridor of cells, counting.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: ...11, 12, 13, 14. Not including Manchas it's 14... (lightbulb) Chief Bogo handed out 14 Missing Mammal files... They're all here. All the missing mammals are right here.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Before she can respond-- CLICK! A door starts to open, Nick and Hopps retreat, stuck next to a DARK CELL.

scene.title: LIONHEART
scene.text: Enough! I don't want excuses, Doctor, I want answers.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Reveal: Mayor Lionheart berating the BADGER DOCTOR by his side. He looks serious, intense, tired.

scene.title: BADGER DOCTOR
scene.text: Mayor Lionheart, please, we're doing everything we can.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps whips out her phone, starts recording.

scene.title: LIONHEART
scene.text: Really? Cuz I got a dozen and a half animals here who've gone off the rails crazy-- and you can't tell me why. Now, I'd call that awfully far from doing everything.

scene.title: BADGER DOCTOR
scene.text: Sir, it may be time to consider their biology.

scene.title: LIONHEART
scene.text: What? What do you mean biology?

scene.title: BADGER DOCTOR
scene.text: The only animals going savage are predators. We cannot keep it a secret. We need to come forward.

scene.title: LIONHEART
scene.text: Hmm... Great idea. Tell the public. And how do you think they're gonna feel about their mayor, who is a lion?! I'll be ruined!

scene.title: BADGER DOCTOR
scene.text: Well, what does Chief Bogo say?

scene.title: LIONHEART
scene.text: Chief Bogo doesn't know. And we are going to keep it that way.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Beep-beep-beep-- Hopps' parents call in. She frantically tries to silence her phone.

scene.title: LIONHEART
scene.text: Someone's here!

scene.title: BADGER DOCTOR
scene.text: Sir, you need to go, now! (calls out) Security! Sweep the area!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: AN ALARM SOUNDS. The door to the cell Hopps and Nick are in triggers shut. They notice WOLVES approaching.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Great! We're dead. We're dead. That's it. I'm dead. You're dead. Everybody's dead.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: This gives Hopps an idea. She looks at the HUGE TOILET.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Can you swim?

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: What? Can I swim? Yes, I can swim. Why?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: The Wolves storm in, searching for the intruders... and see the swirling water of a toilet disappearing down the drain. Hopps and Nick fly through the water slide like tubes of the sewer system, cascading over a waterfall. Both scream. They land in the river below. Nick pop up first. He looks desperately for Judy.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Carrots?! Hopps?! Judy?!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: She emerges, gasping for breath, holding up the bagged phone.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: We gotta tell Bogo!

scene.title: INT. BOGO'S OFFICE - DAY
scene.text: CLOSE ON BOGO'S PHONE: Gazelle and Bogo dance on stage. It's the same app Clawhauser used earlier.

scene.title: GAZELLE
scene.text: Wow, you are one hot dancer... (robo-voice)

scene.title: ...CHIEF BOGO.
scene.text: Bogo is dancing along when, suddenly, Clawhauser bursts in.

scene.title: CLAWHAUSER
scene.text: Chief Bogo!

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: (guilty) Not now!

scene.title: CLAWHAUSER
scene.text: Wait, is that Gazelle?

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: (struggling to silence his phone) No!

scene.title: GAZELLE
scene.text: I am Gazelle, and you are one hot dancer.

scene.title: CLAWHAUSER
scene.text: You have the app too?! (ecstatic) Oh, jeeeeez!

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: Clawhauser, can't you see I'm working on the missing mammal cases?!

scene.title: CLAWHAUSER
scene.text: Oh, yes of course! About that, sir... Officer Hopps just called... She found all of `em.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Bogo's eyes widen.

scene.title: GAZELLE
scene.text: Wow! I'm impressed.

scene.title: EXT. ASYLUM - DAY
scene.text: Cop cars and helicopters surround the asylum. Hopps, flanked by Bogo and other COPS, leads Lionheart out of the building.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Mayor Lionheart, you have the right to remain silent. Anything--

scene.title: LIONHEART
scene.text: You don't understand. I was trying to protect the city.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: You were just trying to protect your job.

scene.title: LIONHEART
scene.text: No. Listen, we still don't know why this is happening. It could destroy Zootopia.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: You have the right to remain silent. Anything you say can and will be used against you in a court of law...

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick hangs back, proudly flashing his Junior Detective badge.

scene.title: INT. ZPD - LOBBY
scene.text: Bogo addresses the press. Behind him, POSTERS of the Savage Animals-- each one MUZZLED.

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: Ladies and Gentlemammals... 14 mammals went missing and all 14 have been found by our newest recruit, who will speak to you in a moment. But first, let me remind you--

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Bogo's voice trails off in the background as Nick and Hopps watch from the side. Hopps bites her nails, nervous.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Rrrgh. I am so nervous...

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Okay, press conference 101: You wanna look smart?

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Answer their question with your own question and then answer that question. Like this, "Excuse me. Officer Hopps, what can you tell us about the case?" (pretending to be Hopps) "Well, was this a tough case? Yes. Yes it was." You see?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: You should be there with me. We did this together.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Well, am I a cop? No. No, I am not.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Funny you should say that, because I've been thinking... it would be nice to have a partner.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: She hands Nick an APPLICATION. Then-- click-- she holds out the carrot pen to him.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Here. In case you need something to write with.

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: At twenty-two hundred hours, we found all these missing animals...

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Bellwether gestures to Judy to come up.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Officer Hopps, it's time.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: As Hopps goes, Nick smiles. He's touched...

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: So now, I'll turn things over to the officer who cracked the case. Officer Judy Hopps.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps takes a deep breath and steps up to the dais.

scene.title: PRESS
scene.text: Officer Hopps! / Over here! / Here!

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: (pointing to a REPORTER) Yes?

scene.title: REPORTER
scene.text: What can you tell us about the animals that went savage?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Well, the animals in question... (glances at Nick) Are they all different species? Yes. Yes they are.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick smiles, gives a thumbs up.

scene.title: REPORTER 2
scene.text: Okay, so what is the connection?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Well, all we know is that they are all members of the predator family.

scene.title: ANOTHER REPORTER
scene.text: So, predators are the only ones going savage?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: That is accu-- Yes, that is accurate. Yes...

scene.title: REPORTER 3
scene.text: Wow. Why is that happening?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: We still don't know--

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: More disappointed rumbling.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: (trying to appease) Ah, it may have something to do with biology.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: On Nick-- huh? The press reacts, too... big time.

scene.title: REPORTER
scene.text: What do you mean by that?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: A biological component. You know, something in their DNA...

scene.title: REPORTER 4
scene.text: (more aggressive) In their DNA? Can you elaborate on that, please?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Yes. What I mean is, thousands of years ago... um... predators survived through their aggressive hunting instincts. For whatever reason, they seem to be reverting back to their primitive, savage ways.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick doesn't like what he's hearing.

scene.title: REPORTER
scene.text: Of course they did.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick looks at the posters of the muzzled animals and shakes his head, disbelieving. FLASH BACK to his memory of being muzzled as a child.

scene.title: MEAN KID ANIMAL
scene.text: (during flashback) Aw, is he gonna cry.

scene.title: REPORTER
scene.text: (on Nick, as flashback ends) Officer Hopps, could it happen again?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: It is possible. So we must be vigilant. And we at the ZPD are prepared and are here to protect you...

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: This sends the Press into an absolute frenzy.

scene.title: PRESS
scene.text: Will more mammals go savage? / What is being done to protect us? / Have you considered a mandatory quarantine on predators?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Bellwether steps in, eager to put an end to the questions.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Okay, thank you Officer Hopps, uh, that's all the time that we have. No more questions...

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Bellwether ushers Hopps off stage.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Was I okay?

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Oh, you did fine.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps walks across the lobby to Nick, completely unaware that she just started a controversy.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: (excited) That went so fast! I didn't get a chance to mention you or say anything about how we--

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: (upset) Oh, I think you said plenty.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: What do you mean?

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: (sarcastic, hard) Clearly, there's a biological component? These predators may be reverting back to their primitive, savage ways. Are you serious?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: I just stated the facts of the case. I mean, it's not like a bunny could go savage...

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Right. But a fox could? Huh?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Nick, stop it. You're not like them.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Oh, there's a them now?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: You know what I mean. You're not that kind of predator.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: The kind that needs to be muzzled? The kind that makes you think you need to carry around Fox Repellent?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps sighs guiltily.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Yeah, don't think I didn't notice that little item the first time we met. (escalating anger) So let me ask you a question. Are you afraid of me? (Hopps looks heartbroken) Do you think I might go nuts? Do you think I might go savage? Do you think I might try to... EAT YOU?!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: He lunges, like he's going to bite her. She flinches and unthinkingly puts her hand on the repellent.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: (calm, hurt) ...I knew it. Just when I thought somebody actually believed in me...

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: He shoves the application at her.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Probably best if you don't have a predator as a partner.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: As he walks away, he takes off the sticker badge, crumples it and tosses it away.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: No. Nick. Nick!

scene.title: REPORTER 5
scene.text: Officer Hopps! Were you just threatened by that predator?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: No. He's my friend.

scene.title: REPORTER 6
scene.text: We can't even trust our own friends?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: That is not what I said! Please!

scene.title: REPORTERS
scene.text: Are we safe? / Have any other foxes gone savage?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: But no one will listen. Not anymore.

scene.title: INT. NEWS STUDIO - DAY
scene.text: Two ANCHORS sit in front of a graphic: TUNDRATOWN TRAGEDY.

scene.title: FEMALE BOBCAT NEWS ANCHOR
scene.text: More bad news in this city gripped by fear.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: News footage shows a CARIBOU being loaded into an ambulance. Another shot shows a POLAR BEAR in a muzzle.

scene.title: FEMALE BOBCAT NEWS ANCHOR
scene.text: A caribou is in critical condition, the victim of a mauling by a savage polar bear. This-- the 27th such attack-- comes just one week after ZPD Officer Judy Hopps connected the violence to traditionally predatory animals.

scene.title: MALE MOOSE NEWS ANCHOR
scene.text: Meanwhile, a peace rally organized by pop star, Gazelle, was marred by protest.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: The news story cuts to footage of THE PROTEST: Hopps is caught in the middle of the PROTESTERS, trying to separate them.

scene.title: PIG
scene.text: Go back to the forest, predator!

scene.title: LEOPARD
scene.text: I'm from the savannah!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: GAZELLE gives a sound bite to a NEWS REPORTER.

scene.title: GAZELLE
scene.text: Zootopia is a unique place. It's a crazy, beautiful, diverse city where we celebrate our differences. (gestures to PROTESTERS in background) This is not the Zootopia I know.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Gazelle's interview plays as VO over a series of shots: ON A SUBWAY: Hopps watches a MOTHER RABBIT bring her CHILD close as a LION gets on the train.

scene.title: GAZELLE
scene.text: The Zootopia I know is better than this.

scene.title: GAZELLE
scene.text: We don't just blindly assign blame. We don't know why these attacks keep happening...

scene.title: IN THE HOSPITAL:
scene.text: Mrs. Otterton watches her husband flail like a madman in a padded room. Judy approaches her.

scene.title: GAZELLE
scene.text: ...but it is irresponsible to label all predators as savages.

scene.title: MRS. OTTERTON
scene.text: That's not my Emmitt.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: On Hopps-- a look of exhaustion and distress. BACK ON Gazzelle's interview--

scene.title: GAZELLE
scene.text: We cannot let fear divide us. Please-- give me back the Zootopia I love...

scene.title: INT. ZPD OFFICE - DAY
scene.text: The broadcast plays from Hopps' desk computer. As she watches, Bogo walks up behind her.

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: Come on Hopps. The new Mayor wants to see us.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: The Mayor? Why?

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: It would seem you've arrived.

scene.title: INT. ZPD LOBBY - DAY
scene.text: Clawhauser sighs and closes his laptop. He loads it into a box of his desk items. Hopps enters.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Clawhauser? What're you doing?

scene.title: CLAWHAUSER
scene.text: Um, they thought it would be better if a predator such as myself wasn't the first face you that you see when you walk into the ZPD.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: What?

scene.title: CLAWHAUSER
scene.text: They're gonna move me to Records. It's downstairs. By the boiler.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps' face falls. Bogo waits for her in the background.

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: Hopps!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Off Hopps' heartbroken look, we

scene.title: CLOSE ON:
scene.text: A PHOTO of a SMILING HOPPS. Wider to reveal: The photo is on a PAMPHLET that reads, ZPD: Integrity. Honesty. Bravery.

scene.title: INT. BELLWETHER'S OFFICE - DAY
scene.text: Hopps looks at the pamphlet. Bellwether sits across from her at her desk.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Um... I don't understand.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Our city is 90% prey, Judy. And right now they're just really scared. You're a hero to them. They trust you. And so that's why Chief Bogo and I want you to be the public face of the ZPD.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Bogo sits next to Hopps. She looks at the pamphlet again.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: (struggling to find words) I'm not... I'm not a hero. I came here to make the world a better place, but I think I broke it.

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: Don't give yourself so much credit, Hopps. The world has always been broken. That's why we need good cops-- like you.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: With all due respect, sir, a good cop is supposed to serve and protect-- help the city. Not tear it apart. (deep sigh) I don't deserve this badge.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: She removes her badge...

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: Hopps.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Judy, you've worked so hard to get here. It's what you've wanted since you were a kid. You can't quit...

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Thank you for the opportunity.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps sets her badge on the desk and walks out. Bellwether and Bogo look at one another in shock and concern.

scene.title: EXT. HOPPS' FARMS VEGETABLE STAND - DAY
scene.text: Hopps, with a thousand yard stare, works the carrot stand. She wraps some carrots in a newspaper-- Headline: GROWING UNREST DIVIDES CITY-- and hands them to a RABBIT FAMILY.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: A dozen carrots.

scene.title: RABBIT MOM
scene.text: Thanks!

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Have a nice day.

scene.title: RABBIT MOM
scene.text: (to daughter) Come on.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps reads the paper as Stu and Bonnie approach, concerned.

scene.title: STU HOPPS
scene.text: Hey there, Jude-- Jude the dude, remember that one? How we doin?

scene.title: HOPPS.
scene.text: I'm fine.

scene.title: BONNIE HOPPS
scene.text: You are not fine. Your ears are droopy.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps remains fixed on the newspaper and lets out a sigh.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Why did I think I could make a difference?

scene.title: STU HOPPS
scene.text: Because you're a trier, that's why.

scene.title: BONNIE HOPPS
scene.text: You've always been a trier.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Oh, I tried. And it made life so much worse for so many innocent predators.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Off-screen, BEEP-BEEP.

scene.title: STU HOPPS
scene.text: Oh, not all of them, though. Speak of the devil. Right on time.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: A truck pulls up. Its sign reads: GIDEON GREY'S GOOD BAKED STUFF... With Fresh Produce From Hopps Family Farms.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Is that... Gideon Grey?

scene.title: STU HOPPS
scene.text: Yep. It sure is. We work with him now.

scene.title: BONNIE HOPPS
scene.text: He's our partner. And we never would have considered it had you not opened our minds.

scene.title: STU HOPPS
scene.text: That's right. I mean, Gid's turned into one of the top pastry chefs in the tri-burrows.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: That's really cool, you guys.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: GIDEON GREY, now paunchy, climbs out his truck.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Gideon Grey. I'll be darned.

scene.title: ADULT GIDEON GREY
scene.text: Hey Judy-- I'd like to say I'm sorry for the way I behaved in my youth. I had a lotta self-doubt that manifested itself in the form of unchecked rage and aggression. I was a major jerk.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Well, I know a thing or two about being a jerk...

scene.title: ADULT GIDEON GREY
scene.text: Anyhow-- I brought you all these pies.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: He holds out some pies. KID BUNNIES come tearing across the field, bee-lining for the pies. Stu shouts at the kids.

scene.title: STU HOPPS
scene.text: Hey kids! Don't you run through that midnicampum holicithias!

scene.title: RABBIT KID
scene.text: (holding back the others) Whoa, whoa, whoa!

scene.title: ADULT GIDEON GREY
scene.text: Now there's a 4-dollar word, Mr. H. My family always just called them night howlers.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Wait. What?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: I'm sorry, what did you say?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Stu gestures to the flowers growing on the edge of the crops.

scene.title: STU HOPPS
scene.text: Oh, Gid's talking about those flowers, Judy. I use `em to keep bugs off the produce. But I don't like the little ones going near `em on account of what happened to your Uncle Terry.

scene.title: BONNIE HOPPS
scene.text: Yeah, Terry ate one whole when we were kids and went completely nuts.

scene.title: STU HOPPS
scene.text: He bit the dickens out of your mother.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: (a dawning realization) A bunny can go savage...

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: We stay on Hopps as she pieces it together.

scene.title: BONNIE HOPPS
scene.text: Savage? Well, that's a strong word. But it did hurt like the devil.

scene.title: STU HOPPS
scene.text: Well sure it did. There's a sizable divot in your arm. I'd call that savage.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: (as if doing an equation) Night howlers aren't wolves. They're flowers. The flowers are making the predators go savage. That's it! That's what I've been missing!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps races away, then turns back.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Oh, keys! Keys! Keys! Keys! Hurry! Come on! Thank you, I love you bye!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Stu tosses her the keys to his pick-up. Hopps jumps into the truck, peels out, leaving Stu and Bonnie in the dust.

scene.title: STU HOPPS
scene.text: You catch any of that, Bon?

scene.title: BONNIE HOPPS
scene.text: Not one bit.

scene.title: GIDEON GREY
scene.text: Well, that makes me feel a little better. I thought she was talking in tongues or something.

scene.title: EXT. ZOOTOPIA - SAHARA SQUARE - STREET
scene.text: Hopps drives the farm truck to Finnick's van. She knocks.

scene.title: FINNICK
scene.text: Who is it?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: I need to find Nick. Please.
Finnick gives her a reluctant look, then softens.

scene.title: EXT. BRIDGE - LATER
scene.text: Hopps arrives at an underpass. She looks around, it's a desolate, sad place.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Nick? Nick!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: There's Nick, sitting on a lawn chair under the bridge.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Oh, Nick! Night howlers aren't wolves. They're toxic flowers. I think someone is targeting predators on purpose and making them go savage.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Wow. Isn't that interesting.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: He gets up, walks under the bridge. She follows.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Wait! Wait, please-- I know you'll never forgive me. And I don't blame you. I wouldn't forgive me either. I was ignorant and irresponsible and small-minded... But predators shouldn't suffer because of my mistakes. I have to fix this, but I can't do it without you.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: He sighs, but still won't look at her.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: (getting emotional) And after we're done, you can hate me, and that'll be fine, because I was a horrible friend and I hurt you... and you can walk away knowing you were right all along, I really am just a dumb bunny.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: It seems she lost him, then:

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: I really am just a dumb bunny. I really am just a dumb bunny.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps cocks her head. Huh? Nick turns to her... holding her recording pen.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Don't worry, Carrots, I'll let you erase it... in 48 hours.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps sniffles and wipes a tear from her eye.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Alright, get in here.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps leans her head on Nick's chest. He gives her a hug.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Okay. Oh, you bunnies... You're so emotional. There we go. Deep breath. (then) Are you just trying to steal the pen. Is that what this is? (then) You are standing on my tail, though. Off, off, off.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: I'm sorry.

scene.title: INT. HOPPS' FAMILY TRUCK - MOMENTS LATER
scene.text: Hopps drives as Nick sits shotgun-- eating blueberries.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: I thought you guys only grew carrots. (then, eats) What's the plan?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: We are gonna follow the night howlers.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Okay. How?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: (shows picture of weasel) Know this guy?

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Uh-huh. I told you, I know everybody.

scene.title: EXT. ZOOTOPIA STREET - LATER
scene.text: We find the weasel selling crappy knock-off merchandise on a street corner.

scene.title: DUKE WEASELTON
scene.text: Well, hello, step right up! Anything you need... I got it. All your favorite movies! I got movies that haven't even been released yet!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: An ARMADILLO CUSTOMER scans an array of blatant knock-off movies like "Wreck-it Rhino," "Wrangled," and "Pig Hero 6."

scene.title: DUKE WEASELTON
scene.text: Hey, 15% off! 20! Make me an offer! Come on!

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: (suddenly appearing) Well, well, look who it is. The duke of bootleg.

scene.title: DUKE WEASELTON
scene.text: What's it to you, Wilde? Shouldn't you be melting down a popsicle or something? (sees Hopps) Hey, if it isn't Flopsy the Copsy.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: We both know those weren't moldy onions I caught you stealing. What were you gonna do with those night howlers, Wessleton?

scene.title: DUKE WEASELTON
scene.text: It's Weaselton. Duke Weaselton. And I ain't talking, rabbit. And ain't nothing you can do to make me.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Weaselton flicks a toothpick in her face. Hopps smiles at Nick.

scene.title: INT. MR. BIG'S PLACE - A LITTLE LATER
scene.text: We find polar bears holding the weasel over the ice pit.

scene.title: MR. BIG
scene.text: Ice `em.

scene.title: DUKE WEASELTON
scene.text: Aaagh! Agh! (to Nick) Ya dirty rat! Why ya helping her?! She's a cop!

scene.title: MR. BIG
scene.text: And the godmother to my future granddaughter.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Reveal: FRU FRU is pregnant.

scene.title: FRU FRU SHREW
scene.text: I'm gonna name her Judy.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Aw.

scene.title: MR. BIG
scene.text: (to polar bears) Ice this weasel.

scene.title: DUKE WEASELTON
scene.text: All right, all right, please! I'll talk! I'll talk. I stole them night howlers so I could sell `em. They offered me what I couldn't refuse... Money.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: And to whom did you sell them?

scene.title: DUKE WEASELTON
scene.text: A ram named Doug. We got a drop spot underground...

scene.title: EXT. SUBWAY STATION - A LITTLE LATER
scene.text: Nick and Hopps approach an abandoned subway station.

scene.title: DUKE WEASELTON
scene.text: ...Just watch it. Doug is the opposite of friendly. He's unfriendly...

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: They arrive at the entrance and quickly sneak under the gate.

scene.title: INT. ABANDONED SUBWAY STATION - MOMENTS LATER
scene.text: They emerge on a platform and spot an abandoned subway car.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Come on!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: As they sneak up to it... Hopps pulls open the window and looks inside the car. They both jump into...

scene.title: INT. THE GREENHOUSE CAR - CONTINUOUS
scene.text: They both see the rows of night howlers.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: The weasel wasn't lying.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Yeah, looks like old Doug's cornered the market on night howlers...

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Click! A door opens off screen! They quickly hide under a desk as a TOUGH SHEEP LABWORKER enters. He goes through the process of harvesting the pollen, eventually producing a small, blue paint ball pellet of night howler toxin. Nick and Hopps watch it all. The Sheep's phone RINGS.

scene.title: DOUG
scene.text: (into phone) You got Doug here. What's the mark? Cheetah in Sahara Square. Got it.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: The Sheep loads a gun, cocks it. We see a MAP with pictures of a various animal targets.

scene.title: DOUG
scene.text: (into phone) Serious? Yeah, I know they're fast. I can hit him. Listen, I hit a tiny little otter through the open window of a moving car.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hearing this, the pieces of the puzzle start falling into place for Hopps. She looks up at the picture of Otterton-- we FLASHBACK to see Doug hitting him with a serum pellet. Then Hopps looks at Manchas's picture-- we FLASHBACK to that.

scene.title: DOUG
scene.text: (into phone) Yeah I'll buzz you when it's done. Or you'll see it on the news. Ya know, whichever comes first.
BAM, BAM, BAM! The goons have returned.

scene.title: WOOLTER
scene.text: Hey Doug, open up! We've got your latte.

scene.title: DOUG
scene.text: (into phone) Alright, Woolter and Jesse are back, so I'm leaving now. (then) Out.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps looks around, what is she going to do. As Doug goes to the door to unlock it, Hopps creeps out of their hiding spot.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Hey. Hey! Where are you going? Get back here! What are you doing?! He's gonna see you! What are you looking at? Hey! Whatever you're thinking, stop thinking it. Carrots! Carrots!

scene.title: DOUG
scene.text: It better have the extra foam this time--

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: BAM! Hopps kicks Woolter in the back, knocking him into the other two Thugs. Hopps locks the door.

scene.title: WOOLTER
scene.text: Hey, open up!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: The Thugs start banging on the doors.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: What are you doing?! You just trapped us in here!

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: We need to get this evidence to the

scene.title: ZPD.
scene.text: Nick picks up the case.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Okay. Great. Here it is. Got it.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: No. All of it!

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Wait, what?
Hopps rushes to the control room, tries to start the engine.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Great, you're a conductor now? Hey, listen-- It would take a miracle to get this rust-bucket going.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: The train starts moving.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Well... Hallelujah!

scene.title: DOUG
scene.text: (on the phone) We kinda got a situation at the lab... (noticing train) Oh! It just got worse!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Doug and his minions race after the train.

scene.title: INT. SUBWAY CAR - SAME
scene.text: Nick and Hopps race away, feeling fairly confident.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Mission accomplished. Would it be premature for me to do a little victory toot-toot?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: All right. One toot-toot.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick blows the train whistle.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Well, I can cross that off the bucket list.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Things are looking up, when: BAM! Woolter just busted into the car. Nick slams the door closed right before Woolter gets to them.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: I may have to rescind that victory toot-toot.
Noise from the roof above them... BAM! BAM! BAM!

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Maybe that's just hail?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Uh-oh. Jesse busts through the window. He's stuck, but flailing at Hopps. Nick tries to pull him away.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Back off!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick gets punched backward and notices Woolter charging toward the door at full speed. Right before Woolter arrives, Nick pulls the door open.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Incoming!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Woolter's momentum carries him into Jesse-- dislodging him onto the tracks. Hopps is knocked out the window, but grabs onto Woolter's horn. Hopps tries to hang on as the subway car hurtles down the tunnel.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Carrots?!

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: (to Nick) Don't stop! Keep going!

scene.title: JESSE
scene.text: (about to get run over) No! No! Please stop!

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Do not stop this car!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Jesse dives to safety and Hopps gets bucked up onto the top of the train. Nick takes the wheel as the train emerges above ground. Hopps looks up to see... Another train coming toward them... on the same track! She sees a turn-off switch ahead.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Speed up, Nick! Speed up!

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: (staving off Woolter) There's another train coming!

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Trust me! SPEED! UP!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Woolter sees the train coming and tries to get unstuck, but he can't. He struggles like crazy.

scene.title: WOOLTER
scene.text: Stop the train! Hey!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Then, at the last second, Hopps appears next to him:

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Hey. Need some help?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps kicks Woolter off the train and he lands perfectly on the turn-off switch on the tracks below. At the last possible second, their train switches tracks-- just avoiding the oncoming car. Except...

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Oh no! Oh no, no, no! Too fast! Hold on!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: The train derails as it takes the curve. The night howlers catch fire.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: I think this is our stop!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps and Nick dive out of the car and onto a subway platform... Just as the lab car EXPLODES.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Okay... Maybe some of the evidence survived.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: A second loud EXPLOSION. The train is destroyed.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Everything is gone. We've lost it all.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: (shaking head) Yeah. Oh, except for this.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick holds up a case-- containing a gun and a pellet.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Oh, Nick! Yes!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Judy SMACKS him on the arm. Hard. Nick grimaces.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Ow.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Come on! We gotta get to the ZPD. Cut through the Natural History Museum!

scene.title: INT. NATURAL HISTORY MUSEUM - NIGHT
scene.text: Nick and Hopps race through the empty museum. The ZPD entrance is just ahead.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Oh! There it is!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: They're going to make it.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Judy! Judy!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Judy and Nick stop and turn. There's Bellwether, standing behind them with TWO RAM COPS.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Mayor Bellwether! (out of breath, rapidly) We found out what's happening. Someone's darting predators with a serum-- that's what's making them go savage.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: (applauding) I am so proud of you, Judy. You did just a super job.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Thank you, ma'am. (troubling realization) How did you know where to find us?

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: I'll go ahead and I'll take that case now.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: You know what... I think Nick and I will just take this to the ZPD...

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps turns toward the ZPD. Uh oh. One of Bellwether's RAMS is blocking the way. Nick just now gets what's going on.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Run!                            Run!
They take off-- away from the ZPD-- down a dark corridor.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Get them!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps looks over her shoulder as she runs-- not seeing a sharp WOOLY MAMMOTH TUSK sticking out. It slashes her leg, knocking her off her feet.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Ach!

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Ah Carrots!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick goes to her. Her leg is bleeding badly.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: I got ya, come here, come here.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: He carries her behind a pillar.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Okay, now just relax.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick digs a handkerchief from his pocket. A few BLUEBERRIES fall out with it.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Whoops... Blueberry?

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Pass.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Come on out, Judy!

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Take the case. Get it to Bogo.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: I'm not gonna leave you behind. That's not happening.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: I can't walk.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Just, we'll think of something.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Bellwether finally appears, flanked by the Rams.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: We're on the same team, Judy!

scene.title: WITH BELLWETHER & THUGS --
scene.text: Bellwether talks as they look for Hopps and Nick...

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Underestimated. Under-appreciated. Aren't you sick of it? Predators. They may be strong and loud, but prey out-number predators 10 to one.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Bellwether sees a SHADOW-- RABBIT EARS. She gestures to the RAMS-- there they are.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Think of it-- 90 percent of the population, united against a common enemy. We'll be unstoppable.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: The Rams are about to pounce on Hopps and Nick... only to find the shadow is coming from a MUMMIFIED JACKALOPE being illuminated by a shop light.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: (to Goons) Over there!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps and Nick are making a run for it. They're going to make it to the ZPD! When suddenly... BAM! A RAM tackles them both, knocking the case out of Nick's paws. Both of them fall into a sunken diorama. Bellwether, with case in hand, looks over the edge.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Well, you should have stayed on the carrot farm, huh? It really is too bad; I really did like you.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: What are you going to do? Kill me?

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: No! Of course not... he is.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Bellwether takes the dart gun out of the case, aims at Nick and... THWICK! She darts him.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: No! Nick?!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick starts to shake and crouch. Bellwether dials her phone.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Yes, police! There's a savage fox in the natural history museum. Officer Hopps is down! Please hurry!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick is starting to turn.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: No. Nick, don't do this. Fight it.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Oh, but he can't help it, can he? Since preds are just biologically predisposed to be savages.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick stalks Hopps, who tries to limp away.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Gosh, think of the headline: "Hero Cop Killed By Savage Fox..."

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: So that's it, prey fears predator, and you stay in power?

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Yeah, pretty much.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: It won't work.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Fear always works. And I'll dart every predator in Zootopia to keep it that way.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: (as Nick stalks her) Oh, Nick! No!

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: Bye-Bye, Bunny.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Nick lunges. He attacks. Hopps screams. Bellwether smiles.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Blood, blood, blood! And death.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Bellwether looks confused. Nick stands up.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: All right, you're milking it. Besides, I think we got it, I think we got it. We got it up there, thank you yakkety-yak-- you laid it all out beautifully.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: What?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Bellwether looks at her gun, in disbelief.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Yea, oh, are you looking for the serum? (holds it up) Well, it's right here.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: What you've got in the weapon there- - those are blueberries. From my family's farm.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Livid, Bellwether sees a blueberry in the gun's chamber.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: They are delicious. (licking fingers) You should try some.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: I framed Lionheart, I can frame you too! It's my word against yours!

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Oooo, actually--

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps holds up the carrot pen.

scene.title: BELLWETHER
scene.text: And I'll dart every predator in Zootopia to keep it that way...

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: --It's your word against yours. It's called a hustle, sweetheart. Boom.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Bogo and a TEAM OF COPS burst onto the scene. Bellwether looks to run but there's nowhere to go. She's nailed.

scene.title: INT. NEWS STUDIO - DAY
scene.text: A PREDATOR-PREY news team reads the headlines. FOOTAGE shows Bellwether being led to jail in cuffs and an orange jumpsuit.

scene.title: PREDATOR ANCHOR
scene.text: Former Mayor Dawn Bellwether is behind bars today, guilty of masterminding the savage attacks that have plagued Zootopia of late.

scene.title: PREY ANCHOR
scene.text: Her predecessor, Leodore Lionheart, denies any knowledge of her plot, claiming he was just trying to protect the city.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: A FELINE REPORTER, KITTY COWLICK, interviews Lionheart.

scene.title: LIONHEART
scene.text: Did I falsely imprison those animals? Well, yes. Yes I did. It was a classic "doing the wrong thing for the right reason" kind of a deal.

scene.title: PRED ANCHOR
scene.text: In related news, doctors say the night howler antidote is proving effective in rehabilitating the afflicted predators...

scene.title: INT. HOSPITAL ROOM - DAY
scene.text: Mr. Otterton, who wakes up into the arms of his wife.

scene.title: MRS. OTTERTON
scene.text: Emmitt? Oh... Emmitt...

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: She hugs him and he holds her tight. We pull back to reveal Hopps in the room, watching their reunion.

scene.title: MRS. OTTERTON
scene.text: (to Hopps) Thank you.

scene.title: EXT. ZOOTOPIA CENTRAL PLAZA - DAY
scene.text: Hopps walks through the CENTRAL PLAZA of ZOOTOPIA. She looks around to see animals coming back together. She focuses on two KIDS: one pred, one prey playing soccer.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: When I was a kid, I thought Zootopia was this perfect place where everyone got along and anyone could be anything...

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Hopps kicks the soccer ball with the kids.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Turns out, real life's a little bit more complicated than a slogan on a bumper sticker. Real life is messy.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: AT THE ZPD: Hopps enters to find Clawhauser back at his desk, unpacking. What's more-- TWO COPS approach him with donuts.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: We all have limitations. We all make mistakes. Which means-- hey, glass half full!-- we all have a lot in common. And the more we try to understand one another, the more exceptional each of us will be. But we have to try.

scene.title: EXT. CADET TRAINING GROUNDS - DAY
scene.text: Reveal: Hopps is giving a commencement address to the GRADUATES of the Police Academy.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: So, no matter what type of animal you are, from the biggest elephant to our first fox...

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Reveal: Nick is a cadet. He removes his shades, winks at Hopps.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: I implore you... try. Try to make the world a better place.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: On stage, Hopps readies to pin a BADGE on Nick. As she approaches, they exchange a nod-- a small, sincere gesture. She places the badge, then gives Nick an official salute.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Look inside yourself, and recognize that change starts with you. It starts with me. It starts with all of us.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Caps are thrown in the air. The music fades out, leaving just the APPLAUSE, which is interrupted by:

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: All right! All right...

scene.title: INT. ZPD BULLPEN - DAY
scene.text: Hopps and Nick (now in uniform) sit together among ZPD's finest. Bogo stands at the podium.

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: ...Enough! Shut it! We have some new recruits with us this morning, including our first fox. Who cares.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Ha! You should have your own line of inspirational greeting cards, sir.

scene.title: BOGO
scene.text: Shut your mouth, Wilde. Assignments! Officers Grizzoli, Fangmeyer, Delgato: Tundratown Swat. Snarlov, Higgins, Wolfard: Undercover. Hopps, Wilde... (beat of anticipation) Parking duty. Dismissed. (beat) Just kidding! We have reports of a street racer tearing up Savannah Central. Find him, shut him down.

scene.title: INT. / EXT. COP CAR
scene.text: Hopps drives. Nick rides shotgun, eating a Pawpsickle.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: So are all rabbits bad drivers or is it just you?

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: She slams on the brakes. He lurches forward, accidentally jamming the Pawpsickle into his face.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Oops. Sorry.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: (as he wipes off his face) Sly bunny.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Dumb fox.

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: You know you love me.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Do I know that? Yes. Yes, I do.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: They smile wide. They're stopped at a red light, when suddenly-- a TRICKED OUT RED SPORTS CAR blasts through the light! They look at each other and smile even wider. Hopps stomps on the gas. Nick hits the siren. The patrol car takes off...

scene.title: EXT. STREETS OF ZOOTOPIA - MOMENTS LATER
scene.text: The fleeing sports car comes to a screeching halt. ANGLE ON the license plate: FST NML. Hopps and Nick exit their car and approach the driver.

scene.title: HOPPS
scene.text: Sir, you were going 115 miles per hour. I hope you have a good explanation.

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: But when they get to the driver's window...

scene.title: NICK
scene.text: Flash? Flash? Hundred yard dash?!

scene.title: NULL
scene.text: Yep. It's Flash the sloth.

scene.title: FLASH
scene.text: (several beats) Nick.
